data.title: Indian Multi cutlural OTT platform.
data.meta_description: Meworldet metvchannel a multichannel multilingual OTT platform  Providing hyperlocal content where viewers are provided with wholesome and varied content ranging from entertainment, Local Festival and events Coverage Live, local news, offers, Yoga, Cooking, Podcats, offers and coupons from favorite  Local restaurants, spa, movie tickets. Celebrity Talks, Talent shows information, movies, business, web series, podcasts, advertise the local business and offer services like Media Production, Local Event coverage, Live Festival Celebrations, Blogs, Business Advertising and  many more catering  mainly now to Australia and South Asian regions  with  a vision to cater all over the world offering a  true Multi cutlural OTT platform for indians living abroad and offer the taste of india in their country
